resources.string: We are mobile business solutions: imagined, designed & delivered.

MentorMate started in 2001 around a single innovative app for language educators.\nToday we are an international mobile solutions firm with over 210 employees working in five cities globally.\nOver the last decade, our clients have helped us earn the position of industry leader in providing innovative custom mobile and software, user experience (UX) design, backend integration, data analytics/BI, and management & consulting services focused on the mobile enterprise.
